src:
Un peligroso bache en pleno centro, frente a Camuzzi

02 Nov 2019, 04:57

Preocupados por la posibilidad de que genere algún accidente vial, vecinos advirtieron que “hace más de 20 días que hay un pozo en 7 entre 57 y 58 frente la sede de Camuzzi. “Es peligroso porque no se ve”, afirman.

text:
A dangerous pothole in the center, in front of Camuzzi

02 Nov 2019, 04:57

Concerned about the possibility of generating a road accident, neighbors warned that “more than 20 days ago there is a well in 7 between 57 and 58 in front of the headquarters of Camuzzi. "It's dangerous because you can't see it," they say.
